entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
